channel.title: Is there any way to enable the depth of field?
channel.description:
As the title says: is there any way to enable the depth of field or ambient occlusion? I've been wondering since I saw this screenshot [img]https://u.filepak.com/F1S3_2012-09-15_00011.jpg[/img] But I couldn't figure out how2.
I tried with the nvidia panel but says that the ambient occlusion isn't supported by the game, tried with NvidiaInspector to activate it but doesn't work. Latest version of the driver in case you were wondering.

item.title: Is there any way to enable the depth of field?
item.dc:creator: idclip
item.description:
As the title says: is there any way to enable the depth of field or ambient occlusion?
I’ve been wondering since I saw this screenshot

But I couldn’t figure out how2.

I tried with the nvidia panel but says that the ambient occlusion isn’t supported by the game, tried with NvidiaInspector to activate it but doesn’t work. Latest version of the driver in case you were wondering.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to enable the depth of field?
